b.style: color: rgb(66 , 74 , 82) ; font-family: "palatino" ; font-size: 35px ; font-style: normal ; letter-spacing: normal ; text-indent: 0px ; text-transform: none ; word-spacing: 0px ; background-color: rgb(248 , 249 , 250)

div.span:
Tailored to our needs
Typically does one crucial thing, and does it well
(and in an automated way)

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
